messages.agent_message: Would you like to create a new account?
What type of account would you like me to make for you?
messages.user_message: I want to create a retirement fund account for my son.

messages.agent_message: Ok. Your new account was created, but you need to transfer some funds into this new account to open it. If you specify an account, I can transfer a small amount of funds from that to your new account.
Which account would you like to select for this task?
Ok! I just created a retirement fund account and transferred starter funds into it from chequing.
Would you like to e-transfer any money to your contacts?
Alright, who would you like to send funds to and how much?
Which account would you like to use?
messages.user_message: I want to use chequing for this.

messages.agent_message: All done! I just e-transferred 9 to Nancy from chequing.
Would you like to pay off your outstanding bills today?
Ok! I won't pay off your outstanding bills today.
Would you like to request that one of your contacts sends money to you?
Ok! I won't request money from any of your contacts today.
Would you like to transfer any money between your existing accounts?
Let's do it! How much do you wish to transfer and between which accounts?
messages.user_message: I want to transfer 96 from savings to college fund.

messages.agent_message: Ok! I successfully transferred your requested amount of 96 from savings to college fund.
Completed all bank actions for today. Thank you!
